cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 3.0)

project( mulle-objc-developer NONE)

set( PROJECT_VERSION 0.13.0)


# add cmake module paths to search path
list( INSERT CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 0 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/.mulle-sde/share/cmake")
list( INSERT CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 0 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/.mulle-sde/etc/cmake")
list( INSERT CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 0 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake")


# generated by update
include( _Sources)


set( EXTENSIONS
src/  #backslash is important
)


INSTALL( DIRECTORY ${EXTENSIONS}
DESTINATION "share/mulle-sde/extensions")


######
#
# must be after CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION
include( CMakePackage.cmake) # need extension
include( CPack)
